website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality issues, this heavy-duty table top is a good match for players of poker and other table games.
pros: Two-sided table top gives you the choice of a design side or a blank side
Heavy-duty wooden construction with thick felt
Can be folded when not in use
Comes with built-in drink holders and chip trays for eight players
cons: Some buyers have quality issues with this option that include the cheap carrying case and the cup/chip holders that keep popping out
Has a strong odor right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Great table for board/tabletop gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a poker player. I bought this table to play other tabletop games and I have to say I am very impressed with the quality of the table for the price. I really have no complaints, it is very easy to set up, very sturdy, the felt top works great with playing cards of all types, it's large enough to comfortably fit just about any of my tabletop games and I think I would feel good about sitting up to six people around it. There is room for 8, but it'd be a bit cramped I think. Definitely a great buy in my opinion. (fyi mine did not have the foul odor others had mentioned)
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Find another one
customer_reviews.text: This item at first glance is nice. The felt is medium quality, but for the price it is ok. The problem is, that where the board folds in half, the felt does not go all the way to the ends, and on the blackjack side, the felt doesn't go all the way around the chip holders, making it look unfinished and cheap. Tried to return, but they don't pay return shipping, so it would cost the same thing to do that and risk another shoddy one than try a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend purchasing this
customer_reviews.text: I’m so frustrated I bought this table. It’s total junk. The drink holder / chip stack holders came in popped in on the wrong side of the table. (So if you had the side where all of the lines are showing like where cards go, they would be upside down. They do “kinda” pop in. But they pop out even easier. I was setting up a card night when I started setting everything up and saw this. One of the holders broke and the board is bent anyways. This may be one of my most frustrated purchases I’ve ever had and I didn’t give myself enough time to get a back up.
customer_reviews.author: anthony jumper

customer_reviews.title: Chinese garbage
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of crap. Second table I ordered from Trademark. First one came with 2 holes in the felt. No quality control at the dirt floor Chinese factories I guess. This one came with a cracked corner. The internal board is made of cheap pressed wood that will crack very easily. Shipping packaging was minimal so it cracked in transit. Unfortunately the Chinese have undercut all competitors and driven them out of business. Now they provide substandard products. So, Either fork out big $$$ for a well made poker table or buy garbage from China. Probably loaded with toxic materials.
customer_reviews.author: E M Ree

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy, and versatile. It fits just right over our old (very old) dinette table, and the guys all raved about it. I don't know what material the felt is made from, but one of the guys claims to have a wool allergy, and that's why we can't use the old Army blanket any more. He had no complaint with this felt, so it must be another material (or, he doesn't really have a wool allergy).
customer_reviews.author: jdocop

customer_reviews.title: Replaced old one!
customer_reviews.text: We are card players, especially my husband and his friends. This is like our old table that gave out, but the felt could be better glued down, the edges where the table folds stick up leaving a lump in the middle of the table when open. We use a table knife to push it down but it only goes so far. The rest of the table is nice and easy to store. We get by just wish it was better made.
customer_reviews.author: friscojan

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal deal, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal deal on a foldable Poker/Blackjack table top. Well constructed with sturdy wood and felt with a nice thick feel. Has survived 4 very active poker nights since I received it, with no visible signs of wear afterwards. On a side note, if you're going to flip the table to use the Blackjack side, be sure to remove the chip/drink holders prior to doing so rather than after flipping, as some may fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: The two sides where not aligned when glued together. A simple 10 dollar jig would have made this align perfectly. This means no quality control was even attempted here. The misalignment does not allow the inserts to sit correctly on the blackjack side and i will likely have to separate the 2 sides and align.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: The chip trays pop out easily and are obviously cheaply made, I just glued them down as I don’t need to use both sides. The felt is wrapped around cheap particle board so make sure you have a table underneath to support the table top. I ended up building a kitchen table same size and shape of the poker table top and it works great. I have had a few poker nights since I got it and no issues. If I didn’t have a table supporting the entire poker top though I have no doubt it would have cracked by now. For the money though I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: OK price for an OK table top, but...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is ok for the price, but the Cary bag is a joke. Both zippers broke first time we unzipped it. And they weren't stuck and we didn't pull hard - they just broke with a light pull. As this was a gift, it was really embarassing. Why even include a carry bag if it's such plastic junk with cheap zippers?
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Portable
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little table for 8. I am teaching my son and his friends to play poker (and assorted social skills) and this allows us to stay more focused on the task. My only complaint is the trays are a bit tricky to keep in place once they pop out.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our game room table. The top is heavy enough to stay in place fairly well but as it has felt on both sides, has a "slide" tendency wen bumped. I'm going to add "hook and loop" fastener and elastic hold down that would not damage to top and keep in in place. I still gave it 5 stars as the product is a very good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: TN Homesteader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a poker themed party, and can be used for all games! Love the cup holder, and cleans easily!
customer_reviews.author: Alycia_Carmelina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a stain and inverted
customer_reviews.text: The cup & chip holders were mounted upside down and there's a nasty looking stain on it. It's close to being a quality topper but not quite.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan Child

customer_reviews.title: We need AA!
customer_reviews.text: I finally replaced the one we had for 20 years. The last poker game on that table top sustained 15 wine spills...I SWEAR! I kind of hated to see it go! But the new one is beautiful...so new!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Maiolo

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table top considering the cost. Sturdy and nice that it came with the case. We put it over a small 4 person round card table and it does fit 8 people around it Only downfall is that it has a strange odor, probably the glue used. We let it air outside for 2 days and febreeze'd it a little and that seemed to work
customer_reviews.author: Mom from TX

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great poker table. Very good quality. It's 2 sided, and doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: dap@

customer_reviews.title: Great Temporary Game Table
customer_reviews.text: Put 6 people at each table and, although I thought it would be tight, it worked well. I wouldn't put more! Even straddling the table legs wasn't uncomfortable. The topper is heavy enough that you can lean on it without tipping it. Worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Blum

customer_reviews.title: The table is nice enough, but it is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice enough, but it is not as pictured. My table arrived with blackjack markings on it, in the picture it is a plain green felt. Again, Nice enough table, but I bought it specifically for poker.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Weed

customer_reviews.title: it's decent
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap, it's heavy. The chip/cup holders pop out very easily due to the cheap mechanisms that are supposed to hold them in place. Otherwise, it's a pretty decent card table..
customer_reviews.author: John Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good table top. Used once and upon putting away i noticed cloth wasn't glued well i a couple of spots. Not major issue reglued
customer_reviews.author: Draytrek

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Absolute JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I could have made this myself. Plywood with felt covering that doesn't even fit properly. HUGE lump of material directly in the center seam. Wouldn't have purchased this for $1.00. Chip/drink holders wont even stay in their cutout. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great poker table under $50
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy...the plastic trays pop out but easy fix with superglue, I wish it was padded on top, but overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Quality card top table at decent price
customer_reviews.text: It arrived promptly, seems sturdily built, and I like that it is two sided with a blackjack dealer table on the other side. I also like the fact that it folds in half and comes in a carry case as we live in a smaller house. So it has to be put away when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use, good to leave setup, heavy
customer_reviews.text: It's 2 sided, one side has design the other is just blank. However the cup and chip holders are designed to pop out and flip, but 2 of them came broken, the wood that they attach to is cracked, so putting it away is a pain, but once it's setup it looks nice. VERY heavy but that makes it better to play on as well. For the price it's worth it...
customer_reviews.author: Amit D.

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, but Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bit bulky getting into place, but love it. A space for everyone without anyone being crowded out. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Although the little spring pieces that help hold the chip/drink holder in place are very easy to break and have already broken
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Although the little spring pieces that help hold the chip/drink holder in place are very easy to break and have already broken. This came smelling like manure and took a couple of weeks to air out. Overall happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda U.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money, but the cups that hold the money chips do not stay into the cutouts securely due to a louse locking pin design that is made of plastic. After one week, half of the pins are broken. Otherwise, a nice solid tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo Kung

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I asked for it to be in a different box than the original it comes in .. Unfortunately it was dropped off in its original package and was seen by the person who it was intended for. My gift surprise was tuined
customer_reviews.author: Connie enciso

customer_reviews.title: Already used for one poker game; waiting for second ...
customer_reviews.text: Already used for one poker game; waiting for second game. Hope to win. This turns my living room into a professional looking casino!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Had some white stains on it I had to color ...
customer_reviews.text: Had some white stains on it I had to color it with a coloured pencil other than that it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Cave

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Shipped fast and no significant set-up is ...
customer_reviews.text: Table is exactly what I needed to host a poker night with a group of friends. Great product. Shipped fast and no significant set-up is required.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Chip and drink holders fall out too easily
customer_reviews.text: The table is compact and easy to store and set up. It does make the basement poker game look more professional, but the trays fall out quite a bit and that is annoying. I realize the trays are supposed be removable since the table is two-sided, but it would be better if they could snap in more securely.
customer_reviews.author: sara connell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love the table top for our game night. It holds our drinks and chips perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: my father in law loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, my father in law loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Poker table top
customer_reviews.text: This table top fits perfectly over a card table. I host Tripoley and Texas Hold'em games and this table works perfectly. My guests have commented that they really like the table. It's reasonable priced. The table top comes with a nice carrying case. I take it to friends house and can easily put it in my car. (folds in half).
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is a great table for the price. My only complaint is that the wood by the plastic chip holders is very flimsy & will break as soon as someone puts some pressure on it with their elbow. :(
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: cup holders keep popping out
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, however, the cup/chip holders keep popping out
customer_reviews.author: Sastra M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. My husband has so much fun with it and it stores easy. The cover bag is crap and the zipper broke alert one use, but other than that, it's exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Ettridge

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and it rarely goes int he case, because it's used a lot. Durable and well made. Better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.author: C-I-am-working

customer_reviews.title: Great sized table.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful table and a really good size. I would have given it 5 stars but when I received it some of the plastic users were slipped out of place and left marks in the felt. Hopefully it will come out.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Stinks....literally
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works well. But the weird thing is..... it smells awful. It's definitely got a stink to it. Hoping it will air out.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Autrey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ripped but my husband didn't want to bother returning it. It's cheap :(
customer_reviews.author: Franny F.

customer_reviews.title: This was great for my party
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my party. Durable and very convenient case to take it places. I was blown away by it for what i paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Awful quality. Sent it back for refund. Cup holders fell out .. would not stay in.. cheaply made. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn't even do it justice. When I took it out of its package, I was shocked at how nice it looked! We placed it on a similarly shaped table and put tape on the bottom to stabilize it. It looked like a professional table! I would highly recommend this table to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value, just don't buy for portability
customer_reviews.text: Massive number of decent chips for cheap. Case is flimsy, though. Don't buy if you need to be mobile with your chips. Eventually you'll have a huge mess to pick up, guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: jhelmandollar

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broken before I even opened it. Looking at the construction, I am not surprised. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Annika Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best Quality Materials and Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The cup holders fall out and the overall feel of the product is shoddy. It is useable but not high end at all.
customer_reviews.author: majord04

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for poker night!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandfather loved it. It is the perfect easy to use table top of our month poker game.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Fishy fishy
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but no matter what I do I can't get rid of the fishy smell...definitly a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: Deal Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great game top
customer_reviews.text: This is the second poker top table I have had and this one is the BEST...lays over a regular card table making it wonderful for 8 people to play pan or poker or even to serve dinner for 8 people. Great addition to any home. Paula
customer_reviews.author: guyonly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box and Item arrived damaged. Cup holders were broken off and loose.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: awesome and affordable! !
customer_reviews.text: This met and exceeded my expectations! For the cost I wasn't expecting too much, but it is sturdy, heavy (not in a bad way), and the felt seems to be sturdy and the trays are what I expected. I priced making one myself to save money and I don't think I could buy the parts to make this for what I paid for it!! Someone said they weren't sure if they could get 8 people around it.... yeah um if all 8 people are sunk wrestlers I could see a problem. Plenty of room for my friends. Recommend for affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J

customer_reviews.title: Decent table top for the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought it a Decent table top for the money. I mean I paid around 50.00 and it works, can sit up to 8 people although quite cramped with 8, best suited for 5 or 6 people. Folds in two and hides behind the sofa which is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son-in-law. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice table- I use it for large jigsaw puzzles
customer_reviews.text: Nice table- I use it for large jigsaw puzzles, too. Like the fact I can move the top to other places in the house.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: poker table
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this product but i guess the the bad side to this is that when you fold it up, some of the black chip holders made of plastic keep falling off. gotta be a way to keep it intact
customer_reviews.author: charles huynh

customer_reviews.title: Using all the time
customer_reviews.text: I had some reservations about a portable poker table top, but I've used it quite a bit, and the portability is turning out to be a bonus! Can go anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the money. Promptly shipped and exceeded my expectations .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Danser

customer_reviews.title: Worked for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for a golfing weekend with his friends. It worked, but the quality and construction was not that great. But you get what you pay for. When we unpacked the table, we noticed that the ends on one of the sides was damaged and did not fold flat. Had to do some work to get it to be flat. One of the poker chip holders was cracked in half. Tried to glue it, but the plastic is really thin & it did not glue well. This should be a 6 sided table not an eight sided. Really hard to fit 8 adults around it.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: it’s only for blackjack, and plastic area to hold chips always falls off
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: For the money this table top is great. I've had others cost twice as much and rip and fall apart. This one is heavy and solid. Good buy...
customer_reviews.author: Kim E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for but some parts are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but a little small
customer_reviews.text: Nice table top but it will not fit 8 adults comfortably. You will really only be able to get 5 people
customer_reviews.author: Craig B. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen table works better.
customer_reviews.text: table reeked of formaldehyde, and chip slots and holes for drinks were in useless places. Very poor thought.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie Cross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing quality. HEAVY not at all like some of the others I have seen. The colors are bright and its real to casino table. If you have someone who loves to play the tables get this gift. Do not be fooled its heavy! Doesn't sit well on anything but a 70 round table.
customer_reviews.author: prissy chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The black plastic that hold the chips constantly fatal out
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: One small flaw - but otherwise we'll built
customer_reviews.text: For the most part a well made product. The only issue we found the first time we used it was that the felt was glued down overtop a small sharp object . There appears to be no way to remove it without making a hole in the felt. This is on the poker side of the table.Otherwise it's a very sturdy table top.
customer_reviews.author: Pete LaJoice

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great but had to glue cup holder down other than that i would give it a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Cash McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's Man Cave. He loves it. It fits well and looks good. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybell

customer_reviews.title: Plan to return it because the smell is just not right - to us it smells like manure.
customer_reviews.text: This table, the box it came in and the carrying case have a very offensive odor. We tried airing it out in the sun and it still smells. Plan to return it because the smell is just not right - to us it smells like manure.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: For the money again it'sok WHat I didn't like it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: tabletop ok but cup holders don't stay in place.For the money again it'sok WHat I didn't like it wasn't New
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Memoli

customer_reviews.title: Happy Playing!
customer_reviews.text: I Love the table top! It was cheap, inexpensive and great quality for less! It even shipped free to Alaska!
customer_reviews.author: Lymas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too heavy and the money holding slots keep popping out
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: The plastic chip holder and drink holder pieces pop out ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic chip holder and drink holder pieces pop out with the slightest touch. I had to superglue them into place. Other than that it’s solid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lange

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and price but the zipper broke the first day.
customer_reviews.author: kori

customer_reviews.title: Not super high quality
customer_reviews.text: it works well. Not super high quality, but I did not pay that much for it.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Ellworth

customer_reviews.title: lousy packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was damaged on delivery. A complaint made by many. Also the first time I tried to run the zipper it broke, also shared by many. The table top itself seems fine. We will see over time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald K Roussey

customer_reviews.title: Small table
customer_reviews.text: Well built but smaller than expected. If we can actually fit 8 adults at this table I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a guys weekend a few months ago. Glad I had it. Worked great. Was nice to turn a regular table I to a card pla y I g table. Drink holders are shallow but nice to have. Only reason I did on give 5 stars was because of the odor when I initially opened it. Probably the glue? Just plan on airing it out a day or two before using. By the time we used it, it was not noticeable. Zippered carrying bag nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Haflett

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: Once the table top finally arrived, it was a great hit. He has been using it for all kinds of card games and board games. A big success.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Gruwell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, I think it's used
customer_reviews.text: There are stains and a rip on the felt making it appear used! I guess you get what you pay for. It will serve the purpose I need but I'm grossed out to think that it is used. My party is in 2 days so I'll have to live with it. Shame on you, Trademark Deluxe!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pina

customer_reviews.title: UN Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to host poker gatherings at the house. The box came looking like it came through a war zone. the delivery driver even commented on the condition. Hoping the table top was still in tact I opened the remains of the box and removed the table top. The zipper pulls of the nylon carrying case were both broken, the table appeared to me to have been used. The felt had black stains about 6 inches around in several places. I am a frequent buyer on amazon and am grateful for their ease of return in case of experiences like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I ordered. The material and the board are made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thayer

customer_reviews.title: As others have said, the chip holders do not ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the chip holders do not stay in place. I wound up glueing them in to use for playing poker
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Thrall

customer_reviews.title: in excellent condition, was represented well in the description and ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised, in excellent condition, was represented well in the description and we have used it since receiving it and we are very pleased with the purchase. We have transported it from house to house without any issues. Based on prior complaints which we took as guidance we handle it carefully when it is in its carrying case and that too, has been working well for us. A spilled drink on the surface cleaned up immediately and did not stain, which is better than I expected. So without reservation, and although we are reluctant to give out five stars for anything, this one has earned it from our own experience. We are glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the trays for poker chips and drinks could be designed better (springs that hold them in place ard finicky and ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent value, but the trays for poker chips and drinks could be designed better (springs that hold them in place ard finicky and pop out easy when transporting and opening table)
customer_reviews.author: Brent D Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Poker top
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I expected and a great deal. I will go back to your site. It was my first time there and the service was good.
customer_reviews.author: Carol McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the best poker table I have seen. We use the solid green side for Texas Holdem, and prefer the felt without advertisng or stenciled markers. The smooth surface is by far the best. The quality is great and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Trent

customer_reviews.title: Broken Package
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived and it was clearly damaged. Upon removing it from the box one of the cup holders was broken in half and the wood (particle board) under the felt was broken about 10" from the edge. Also, it looked as though someone had already sent the package back once as it was taped up un-evenly and all around the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Good quality for the price. There was a strong glue smell, but I made sure to open the top and let it air out a few hours before our gathering.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeF

customer_reviews.title: Buy as soon as possible...Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in great shape. All you have to do is easily remove the cup holders and insert them to the other side. Looks and feels better then the picture. A must for poker games.
customer_reviews.author: Jod

customer_reviews.title: Poker/Blackjack Table Top with Case
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent deal. It is a well built table topper and comes in handy for cards and games. A little heavy to carry; I guess that's why the case is provided. It's wonderful! We play Mah Jongg at a restaurant as well as poker. We bring our own Table Top and place it on the small, square table at the restaurant. It transforms the small table into a nice, large poker or Maj Jongg table. The drink holders come in handy for our coffee or drinks. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Preece

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JanetteB

customer_reviews.title: great for poker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for poker and holding drinks and poker chips. All the guys were impressed. Fold for easy storage with plastic zip up case.
customer_reviews.author: Aiken, SC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations but a little fragile when you flip the chips holder from one side to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Wagner Dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Trays that hold chips are of poor quality one of the clips snapped right off when ...
customer_reviews.text: Trays that hold chips are of poor quality one of the clips snapped right off when I assembled for the first time!!
customer_reviews.author: pauline

customer_reviews.title: Evil Smell
customer_reviews.text: really bad smell (maybe from glue), took 4 days of airing out and air freshers to be able to play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayman Curtsinger

customer_reviews.title: good poker table top
customer_reviews.text: Its good quality for the price... My hubs is enjoying it..all his buddies fit around it so not bad.. :-)
customer_reviews.author: amanda duitch

product_meta.title: Trademark Deluxe Poker and Blackjack Table Top with Case
product_meta.description: This table top is very convenient and is solid and durable. One side is a 8 player position poker table complete with individual trays for poker chips and a drink holder. These trays are removable and fit into the other side of the table which is a black jack table on the opposite side. The blackjack table has the standard Las Vegas style markings on the high quality green felt. This table top has a really nice feel to it. The best thing about this table top is its convenience. It is very easy to travel with as it fits into the trunk of a car. Its not very heavy for travel but it is solid enough for durable use. Folding the table in half reduces the size to 2 feet by 4 feet for easy storage in a closet or under a bed. The table is made from 1/2 inch wood and covered with a professional style green felt. It is a 48 by 48 inch table top which fits very nicely onto a card table or any kitchen table and instantly tranforms it into a poker or blackjack table. New Features Include: Free Black Nylon Carrying Bag with Heavy Duty 2 Way Zipper & Double Strap Handle! New Trays now have 2 spring loaded pins for a secure fit into the table!
feature_bullets: One side is a 8 player position poker table complete with individual trays for poker chips
This table top is very convenient and is solid and durable.
Folding the table in half reduces the size to 2 feet by 4 feet for easy storage in a closet or under a bed.
Note:Trademark Poker is a virtual brand

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
